org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class SerializerSessionArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.SessionArgs
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanSessionArgs
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSessionArgs

  • public final class SerializerSessionArgs
extends BeanSessionArgs
    Runtime arguments common to all serializer sessions.

    This object specifies information such as session locale or URI context.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SerializerSessionArgs DEFAULT
      Default serializer session args.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerializerSessionArgs

        public SerializerSessionArgs()
        Constructor

      • SerializerSessionArgs

        public SerializerSessionArgs(ObjectMap properties,
                             Method javaMethod,
                             Locale locale,
                             TimeZone timeZone,
                             MediaType mediaType,
                             HttpPartSchema schema,
                             Boolean debug,
                             UriContext uriContext,
                             Boolean useWhitespace)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        properties - Session-level properties.
        These override context-level properties.
        Can be null.
        javaMethod - The java method that called this serializer, usually the method in a REST servlet.
        Can be null.
        locale - The session locale.
        If null, then the locale defined on the context is used.
        timeZone - The session timezone.
        If null, then the timezone defined on the context is used.
        mediaType - The session media type (e.g. "application/json").
        Can be null.
        schema - The part schema for the serialized part.
        Can be null.
        debug - Enable debug mode for this session.
        Can be null to use the debug setting on the bean context..
        uriContext - The URI context.
        Identifies the current request URI used for resolution of URIs to absolute or root-relative form.
        useWhitespace - Override the use-whitespace flag on the serializer.
